content: > for help and community ** join our > free fb group 1 ** ** > this is a scrap yarn project ** skill level intermediate sizes/finished measurements one size 23 circumference men/women yarn weight # 4 aran or worsted scrap yarns in 2 or more colors hook & other materials ● us size h-8 5mm crochet hook ● scissors ● yarn needle ● measuring tape notes pattern is worked in rounds from top down beginning ch1 does not count as 1st st i used scrap yarn in colors you can work this pattern in one solid color or any yarn you have to make the hat wider add rounds increasing by 12 st each stay calm and crochet sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
